about_the_game:
Demo for the game Meat Engine. This demo aims to showcase a work in progress vertical slice of the game with the first few levels being added over time.

What is Meat Engine?
Meat Engine is a retro Sci-Fi boomer shooter inspired by Scorn, Quake, Dusk and Doom.
The game is set in a dark and distant future stricken with war and death. You play as a "Stillborn" a bio weapon created and tasked with protecting the Meat Engine from other alien species looking to destroy it, including, rogue mutated solders created by the Meat Engine. Featuring a large arsenal of biological and living weaponry to brutally eviscerate your foes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent gore and violence.
